com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth

Class AdobeAuthSessionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth.AdobeAuthSessionHelper

  • public class AdobeAuthSessionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    AdobeAuthSessionHelper is used to retrieve the current status and results of authentication related operations.

    Example: A client Activity that is interested in the authentication status can use it in the following way. 

     
 public class SampleActivity extends Activity {

    private static int DEFAULT_SIGN_IN_REQUEST_CODE =  2002; // Can be any int
    private final AdobeUXAuthManager mUxAuthManager = AdobeUXAuthManager.getSharedAuthManager();
    private AdobeAuthSessionHelper mAuthSessionHelper;


    private AdobeAuthSessionHelper.IAdobeAuthStatusCallback mStatusCallback = new AdobeAuthSessionHelper.IAdobeAuthStatusCallback() {
         @Override
         public void call(AdobeAuthSessionHelper.AdobeAuthStatus status, AdobeAuthException exception) {
             if ( status == AdobeAuthSessionHelper.AdobeAuthStatus.AdobeAuthLoggedIn ) {
                 showAuthenticatedUI();
             }
             else {
                 showUnauthenticatedUI();
             }
         }
    }

    void showUnauthenticatedUI() {
         //Set up UI with a button that will launch Creative Cloud Login
         //using mUxAuthManager.login()
    }

    void showAuthenticatedUI() {
         //Set up the Activity's authenticated UI
    }


    @Override
    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
         //Perform initialization operations for the Activity.
         //Show the default UI for the Activity.
         //At this point the status of Creative Cloud Authentication is still not available.

         mAuthSessionHelper = new AdobeAuthSessionHelper(mStatusCallback);
         mAuthSessionHelper.onCreate(savedInstanceState);

    }

    @Override
    protected void onResume() {
         super.onResume();
         mAuthSessionHelper.onResume();
    }

    @Override
    protected void onPause() {
         super.onPause();
         mAuthSessionHelper.onPause();
    }


    @Override
    protected void onStart() {
          super.onStart();
          mAuthSessionHelper.onStart();
    }

    @Override
    protected void onStop() {
         super.onStop();
         mAuthSessionHelper.onStop();
    }

    @Override
    protected void onDestroy() {
         super.onDestroy();
         mAuthSessionHelper.onDestroy();
    }

    @Override
    public void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data) {
         mAuthSessionHelper.onActivityResult(requestCode, resultCode, data);
    }
 }
    Note that in the above example, each Activity lifecycle method calls the corresponding AdobeAuthSessionHelper method.

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AdobeAuthSessionHelper.AdobeAuthStatus
      Enumeration for the authentication status
      static interface  AdobeAuthSessionHelper.IAdobeAuthStatusCallback
      The IAdobeAuthStatusCallback interface is used to receive authentication status and results of authentication operations.
